categories: Category:Star Wars: Return of the Jedi

nodes.text: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi 1: In the Hands of Jabba the Hutt is the first issue of the Star Wars: Return of the Jedi mini-series and is part of the Marvel Star Wars series of comic books.
Part one of a four issue mini-series of the Return of the Jedi movie adaptation.
Unlike the other two previous Marvel Star Wars movie adaptations A New Hope and The Empire Strikes Back, this was not part of the regular series.
There are four pin-up pages in this issue, Bib Fortuna, Sy Snootles & Max Rebo Band and Salacious B. Crumb by Al Williamson and the Tydirium Shuttle by Rick J. Bryant.
The most eagerly-awaited sequel in motion picture history is here, as Luke and Co. go running to the aid of their long-lost friend Han Solo.
Darth Vader checks on the status of the Death Star II while the Rebels attempt to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt.
